title: My Stolen Account was Banned
body: I don't even know what to think. I jsut opened league to play with my friend, when I see that my account was "Banned for the use of third party software". which I thought was strange since I, A. never used anything like that and, B. logged on 3 hours ago and was imediatly taken into the practice tool. Naturally I was weireded out and procedded to look at my match histroy when, low and behold, 3 ranked games I never played, hell, I dont even play ranked. So someone must have taken my account, and gotten it banned. It there anyway I can fix this?

replies.body:
yeap, send in a ticket to https://support.riotgames.com and select account recovery. They will do their due dilligence and determine whether you were truely hacked. If so, they will unban your account. 

Side note: make sure you have a strong password.
Already sent the ticket, and hell yea ima get a newer better password
And remember, be nice to the rep that helps you. They didn't ban you and they have rules to follow. Work with them to provide whatever they need to show your account was compromised.
We've been begging for 2-factor auth for forever. Idk why RIOT hasn't delivered on this.

Same for me. Haven't been playing for about 3 years as I started my studies. Someone hacked and got perma ban on my account. I hope that support will check my ip and will compare with the one (ones?) that has been playing on my account...
